data.title: Specification Limits
data.approvalText: Completion of the following table signifies the approval of this test to be executed. For regression tests, only the Director, Quality signature is required. Electronic signatures may be viewed in the PDF version stored by Quality personnel.
data.scope: This test covers the Specification Limits testing for the ... application.

testItems.description: The following set of Stories are tested.

items.name: Add a new specification limit to any Parameter
Add a new version based on an existing version
manage reference URLs for a specification limit version

exclusions.description: The following features related to Specification Limits are not included in this test.

items.name: Full testing of Managing Specification Limits for Continuous & Replicate Parameters

data.defects: Problems and comments reported in the Test Results log will be analyzed by the project team and a disposition agreed upon. Defects shall be entered into the tracking system.

roles.name: The author
responsibilities: Identifies the test cases and testing strategy (this document)

roles.name: The reviewer
responsibilities: Makes sure that related software requirements are covered by testing

roles.name: The tester(s)
responsibilities: Provides a complete set of evidence of the testing performed (dates and signatures)
Provides the final results of the test effort

roles.name: The approvers
responsibilities: Makes sure the process is followed
Examine the results and determines final Pass/Fail status

data.testAcceptanceCriteria: All test steps must be completed. The feature must satisfy all critical requirements defined in the Software Specification Document.  A pass with deviations will be allowed provided supporting documentation proves no critical requirements fail. All screen prints or printed output evidence must be attached to this document and contain the following information: document number (...), step number, date, and tester’s initials.

preRequisites.description: The following activities must have been completed prior to executing this test:
items: Development is completed and release candidate controlled
Process step(s) and parameter(s) exist for the target product(s)

preparation.description: In preparation for test, the following activities shall be completed and materials shall be available:

subItems: ‘tester’ (your account). Make sure you have admin and Specification Limit User roles and access to All Products for seeded sites
demo - make sure this user exists or add the user from the directory. This user must have only the Specification Limit User role for all seeded products
AAA, BBB for all seeded products

materials.description: The following materials are required for execution of the test:
materials.footer: Adjustments to user roles/product access and configuration will be adjusted during the test as needed for specific requirements

testing.description: Testing is designed to ensure that each component requirement is functioning correctly. In addition to testing each requirement, related functionality will be verified to ensure proper integration with existing functionality. Note that many of the steps in this procedure may be run in parallel by different testers.
